artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Enomotoya Kichibei
description: standing woman in an interior wearing a long blue kimono with light blue and white bird designs; inset picture of table with people wearing blue, eating, and a large barrel on wheels with rice
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Hours of the Yoshiwara (Yoshiwara tokei 吉原時計)
title: Hour of the Snake, Fourth Hour of Day
